mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.*,c.* FROM account a,signon b,profile c where a.userid=b.username and a.userid=c.userid and a.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account(userid, email, firstname, lastname, status, addr1, addr2, city, state, zip, country, phone) VALUES( #{userid}, #{email}, #{firstname}, #{lastname}, #{status}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{city}, #{state}, #{zip}, #{country}, #{phone})
INSERT INTO profile (userid, langpref, favcategory, mylistopt, banneropt) VALUES (#{userid}, #{langpref}, #{favcategory}, #{mylistopt}, #{banneropt})
mapper.update: update account set email = #{email}, firstname = #{firstname}, lastname = #{lastname}, status = #{status}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, city = #{city}, state = #{state}, zip = #{zip}, country = #{country}, phone = #{phone} where userid = #{userid}
